fr.univsavoie.serveurbeta.generationvm.engine

Class XMLModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.univsavoie.serveurbeta.generationvm.engine.XMLModel

  • public class XMLModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
    User: patrick-edouard & nicolas
    Date: 12/2/13
    Time: 5:43 PM

    This class is made to be the representation of the config.xml file.

    For instance, the following sample was made to generate de vm with
    Jenkins pre-installed.

    See Also:
    'http://doc.opensuse.org/projects/kiwi/schema-doc/'
    , 'http://doc.opensuse.org/projects/kiwi/doc/#sec.description.config.xml'
